text:
Sift (http://justsift.com) | Detroit, MI | ONSITE

* Front End ReactJS Engineer

* Backend Node Engineer

* Or Full Stack of the Above

Analytics for your employees. Everything else has a dashboard these days, why don't you have one for the health of your organization?

Our team is small and we are looking to grow. We like to push often, get things done and play a bit of Super Smash Bros. Melee.

Apply by filling out this form: https://goo.gl/forms/da7xs2nKAeXMj9u32
